Package index

All functions

define_response_form()
Define a response form for a nonlinear model
fit_response()
Fit a response curve model using brms
get_response_function()
Get the response function from a fitted model
mrm_extract()
Extract parameters from a fitted model
mrm_infer()
Infer response from a fitted model
mrm_optimal_mix()
Optimal Mix Function This function computes the optimal mix of channels to maximize the total response given a set of response functions and constraints.
mrm_plot_response()
Plot the response of a fitted model
mrm_plot_return()
Plot Marginal and Absolute Rates of Return for Multiple Resource Models
mrm_response_function()
Get the response function from a fitted model
mrm_returns_ranges()
Get Ranges of Maximum Marginal Returns and Average Returns This function computes the ranges of x values corresponding to the maximum marginal returns (MR) and average returns (AR) for a list of marginal response models (MRMs).
